19 inline int CountDigits(int n)
20 {
21  if(n<=0) return 1;
22  else return floor(log10(n) + 1);
23 
24 }

26 inline double Distance2d(const Point p1, const Point p2)
27 {
28  return sqrt(pow(p1.x-p2.x,2) + pow(p1.y-p2.y,2));
29 }

43 inline void TransformPoint(int& x, int& y, Mat transformation_matrix)
44 {
45 
46  vector<Point2f> src = {Point2f(float(x), float(y))};
47  vector<Point2f> dst;
48 
49  perspectiveTransform(src,dst,transformation_matrix);
50 
51  x = int(dst[0].x);
52  y = int(dst[0].y);
53 
54 }

57 inline float CalculateAngle4Quadrants(float opposite, float adjacent)
58 {
59  float angle = 0;
60 
61  if(adjacent != 0 && opposite != 0)
62  {
63  float div = float(abs(opposite))/ float(abs(adjacent));
64  angle = atan(div);
65  angle = angle * 180/PI;
66 
67  if (adjacent > 0 && opposite > 0)
68  ;
69  else if (adjacent < 0 && opposite > 0)
70  {
71  angle = 180 - angle;
72  }
73  else if (adjacent < 0 && opposite < 0)
74  {
75  angle = 180 + angle;
76  }
77  else if (adjacent > 0 && opposite < 0)
78  {
79  angle = 360 - angle;
80  }
81  else {
82  cout << "something went wrong??" << endl;
83  }
84  }
85  else if(adjacent > 0 && opposite == 0)
86  {
87  angle = 0;
88  }
89  else if(adjacent < 0 && opposite == 0)
90  {
91  angle = 180;
92  }
93  else if(adjacent == 0 && opposite > 0)
94  {
95  angle = 90;
96  }
97  else if(adjacent == 0 && opposite < 0)
98  {
99  angle = 270;
100  }
101  else
102  {
103  angle = 0;
104  }
105 
106  return angle;
107 };
108
